constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 97 (Friday, June 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. TITUS:
H.R. 3734.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution,
specifically Clause 1 (relating to providing for the common
defense and general welfare of the United States) and Section
5 of Amendment XIV to the Constitution.
[Page H2693]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to increase the Federal share payable for certain projects in environmental justice communities, and for other purposes.
